articles.author: Clea Caulcutt, Giorgio Leali, Paul de Villepin
articles.title: Macron calls for an international taxation deal to finance climate efforts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president wants an international effort to raise money to tackle climate change.
articles.content:
PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday hinted at a fresh push to revamp the international taxation system to finance climate efforts.
Macron spoke on the sidelines of the Summit for a New … [+3793 chars]
